LanguageData.BM_SpacerChempowerPowerModule.label: chempower module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerChempowerPowerModule.descriptio: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial spine replacement. This particular model is capable of greatly enhancing its host's body by supplying it with additional energy produced by a miniature chemfuel generator. It has to be regularly fueled with chemfuel in order to function.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerAtomipowerPowerModule.label: atompower module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerAtomipowerPowerModule.descripti: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial spine replacement. This particular model is capable of greatly enhancing its host's body by supplying it with additional energy produced by a miniature nuclear generator. It has to be regularly fueled with uranium in order to function.
